title: player_economy_result
description:
For all currencies we use the same logic:
1) clean state - without any multipliers of sum ads
2) all multipliers and all static sum that used in counting of final state bust be logged. Analist must knew the truth formula counting for each currency
3) end state - fianl currency count that user get/spent after battle. User cn see this number in UI.

cl_credits.description: Credits clean income without modificators below

credits_vehicle_factor.description: Credits factor of vehicle. Can be changed by vehicle enrichment.

is_enriched.description: Was the vehicle enriched. True - was, False - wasn't

credits_efforts_factor.description: Credits factor used for villiant effort

credits_multiplier_factor.description: Credits multiplier factor on vehicle (birthday, daily X, etc)

credits_premium_factor.description: Credits factor used if prem activated

credits_booster_sum.description: Credits income sum for activated booster

credits_ads_sum.description: Credits income sum for watching add after battle

credits_rating_sum.description: Credits income sum for raiting battle

credits_repair_needed.description: Full price credits sum repair costs

credits_auto_repair.description: Fact credits sum spent for repair with discount automaticly

credits_auto_ammo.description: Credits sum spent for ammunition automaticly

credits_auto_equip.description: Credits sum spent for equipment(consumables) automaticly

credits_auto_prov.description: Credits sum spent for provision automaticly

credits_auto_camo.description: Credits sum spent for camo autoamticly

end_credits.description: Final credits count user get after battle with all modificators. User can see it in UI.

cl_exp.description: Exp clean income by user vehicle without modificators below

exp_multiplier_factor.description: Exp multiplier factor on vehicle (birthday, daily X, etc.)

exp_premium_factor.description: Exp factor used if prem activated

exp_booster_factor.description: Exp income factor for activated booster

exp_ads_sum.description: Exp income sum for watching add after battle

exp_rating_sum.description: Exp income sum from raiting battles

end_exp.description: Final exp count user get after battle with all modificators. User can see it in UI.

cl_free_exp.description: Free exp income by user vehicle without modificators below

free_exp_prem_factor.description: Free exp income factor for activated prem

free_exp_booster_factor.description: Free exp income factor for actived booster

free_exp_event_sum.description: Free exp income sum from events

free_exp_multiplier_factor.description: Free exp multiplier factor on vehicle (birthday, dailyX, etc.)

end_free_exp.description: Final free exp sum user get after battle with all modificators. He can see it in UI.

cl_crew_exp.description: Crew exp income by user vehicle without modificators below

crew_exp_prem_factor.description: Crew exp income factor for activated prem

crew_exp_booster_factor.description: Crew exp income factor for activated booster

crew_exp_event_sum.description: Crew exp income sum from events

crew_exp_multiplier_factor.description: Crew exp multiplier factor on vehicle (dailyX, birthday, etc.)

end_crew_exp.description: Final crew exp count user get after battle with all modificators

gold_auto_ammo.description: Gold sum spent for ammunition automaticly

factor_aogas.description: Aogas factor multiplied to credits, exp, crew_exp, free_exp
